description: Will grab all of the endpoints listed in config.endpoints and return a single array.
Will proxy a request through to a specified server with the specified values.

body.headers<object|optional>: An optional set of headers (key value pairs)
body.body<object|optional>: An optional body (or json) to send.
body.url<string>: The URL to send the request to.
body.method<string>: The HTTP Method for the proxied request. (GET, POST, etc)

description: Will parse through and return all of the endpoints found within the routes folder of this project.
